name: emp-ai-backend
description: EmProps AI Backend - Distributed AI workload orchestration with specialized machine pools

scripts.dev: pnpm env:validate || pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && turbo run dev
scripts.dev:api: pnpm env:validate || pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && turbo run dev --filter=api
scripts.dev:worker: pnpm env:validate || pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && turbo run dev --filter=worker
scripts.dev:monitor: pnpm env:validate || pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && turbo run dev --filter=monitor
scripts.dev:docs: pnpm env:validate || pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && turbo run dev --filter=docs
scripts.setup:developer: pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && pnpm install && pnpm dev:local-redis
scripts.machine:local:up: pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && pnpm machine:local:down && ./scripts/bundle-worker.sh && cd apps/machine && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-local --profile expose-ports up
scripts.machine:local:up:build: pnpm env:build --profile=full-local && pnpm machine:local:down && ./scripts/bundle-worker.sh && cd apps/machine && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-local --profile expose-ports up --build
scripts.machine:local:down: cd apps/machine && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-local down
scripts.machine:local:logs: docker compose -f apps/machine/docker-compose.yml --env-file apps/machine/.env.local --project-name machine-local logs -f
scripts.machine:local:status: curl -s http://localhost:9092/health | jq || echo '❌ Health check failed'
scripts.machine:prod-test:up: pnpm env:build --profile=prod-test && pnpm machine:prod-test:down && cd apps/machine && MACHINE_IMAGE=emprops/machine:v0.1.6 docker compose -f docker-compose.prod-test.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-prod-test up
scripts.machine:prod-test:up:build: pnpm env:build --profile=prod-test && pnpm machine:prod-test:down && cd apps/machine && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod-test.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-prod-test up --build
scripts.machine:prod-test:down: cd apps/machine && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod-test.yml --env-file .env.local --project-name machine-prod-test down
